<script type="text/javascript">
    var magicToolboxLinks = [];
    var magicToolboxProductId = 105066;
    var magicToolboxTool = 'magiczoomplus';
    var magicToolboxToolMainId = 'MagicZoomPlusImage'+magicToolboxProductId; 
    var magicToolboxOptionTitles = ['color'];
    var magicToolboxSwitchMetod = 'click';
    var magicToolboxMouseoverDelay = 0;

    var mjsAddEventMethod = 'je1';
    if(typeof(magicJS.Doc.je1) == 'undefined') mjsAddEventMethod = 'jAddEvent';
    $mjs(window)[mjsAddEventMethod]('load', function() {
        magicToolboxPrepareOptions();
    });
</script>
 
<script type="text/javascript">
    jQuery(document).ready(function(){
        var window_width = jQuery(window).width();
        var image_container_id = jQuery('.MagicToolboxContainer .MagicZoom').attr('id');
        if(typeof mzOptions !== 'undefined'){

            //fix error zoom out but still show zoom
            mzOptions.onZoomOut = function(image_container_id){
                jQuery(".mz-zoom-window.white-bg.caption-top").not(".mz-expanded").remove();
            }

            /*Callback cua magizoomplus , tạo nút play video*/
            mzOptions.onExpandOpen = function(image_container_id){
                var expandWrap = jQuery(".mz-expand");
                if(expandWrap.length == 0){ return false; }
                var expanthumbWrap = expandWrap.find(".magic-thumbs-wrapper ul");
                var videoThumb = jQuery(".MagicToolboxContainer .MagicToolboxSelectorsContainer").find(".thumb-video");
                var figure = expandWrap.find("figure.mz-figure");
                if(expandWrap.find("video").length){
                    expandWrap.find("video").hide();
                }

                if(figure.children("img").is(":hidden") || !figure.children("img").is(":visible")){
                    figure.children("img").show();
                }

                jQuery('body').append('<div class="MagicThumb-background" style="position: fixed; display: block; top: 0px; bottom: 0px; left: 0px; right: 0px; z-index: 10000; overflow: hidden; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); opacity: 0.3; border: 0px none; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; visibility: visible;">&nbsp;</div>');

                var num = videoThumb.length;
                if(num > 0){
                    for (var i = 0; i < num; i++) {
                        var t = jQuery(videoThumb[i]).clone();
                        var li = jQuery("<li></li>");
                        li.addClass("magic-thumb video-item");
                        li.addClass("magic-thumb");
                        if(t.hasClass('hide')){
                            li.addClass("hide");
                        }
                        li.attr("onclick", "playVideoExpand(this)");
                        if(t.hasClass("mz-thumb-selected")){
                            t.removeClass("mz-thumb-selected");
                        }
                        li.html(t);
                        expanthumbWrap.append(li);
                    }
                }

                /* tab vào ảnh play video thì trigger sự kiện onclick của ảnh play video, qua đó chạy video trên nền mobile,tablet */
                if(expandWrap.find(".video-item").length){
                    expandWrap.find(".video-item").on('touchend',function(){
                        jQuery(this).trigger('click');
                    });
                }
                /*tang do rong main content khi scroll cua window bien mat, de main-content khong bi float sang phai*/
                if(jQuery(window).width() >= 650)
                {
                    jQuery('.main-container').css('padding-right',(jQuery(window).outerWidth() - window_width)  + 'px');
                }
                //add 3d text to Expand zoom 
                                expanthumbWrap.find(".magic-thumb").on("click touchstart", function(){
                    var t = jQuery(this);
                    if(t.hasClass("is-3d")){
                        if(figure.find(".zoom-3d").length == 0){
                            figure.append("<span class='zoom-3d'>3D <span>Image</span></span>");
                        }else{
                            figure.find(".zoom-3d").show();
                        }
                    }else{
                        figure.find(".zoom-3d").hide();
                    }

                    if(!t.hasClass("video-item")){
                        expanthumbWrap.find(".video-item").removeClass("magic-thumb-selected");
                        expandWrap.find("video").hide();
                        figure.children("img").show();
                    }
                    
                });
                //style thumb exspand zoom
                if(jQuery(window).width() <= 768){
                    var numThumbs = expanthumbWrap.find(".magic-thumb").length;
                    expanthumbWrap.find(".magic-thumb").css("width",100/numThumbs-1+"%");
                }

                expandWrap.find(".mz-button").click(function(){
                    figure.find("video").hide();
                    expanthumbWrap.find(".video-item").removeClass("magic-thumb-selected");
                });
            };

            mzOptions.onExpandClose = function(image_container_id){
                var eleContainer = jQuery('#'+image_container_id);
                if(eleContainer.find("figure.mz-figure video").length){
                    eleContainer.find("figure.mz-figure video").hide();
                }
                jQuery('body').find('.MagicThumb-background').remove();
                jQuery('.main-container').css('padding-right','0px');
            };

            mzOptions.onUpdate = function(image_container_id){
                if(typeof arguments[2] != "undefined"){
                    var selected = jQuery(arguments[2]);
                    var expant = jQuery(".mz-expand");
                    if(expant.length){
                        expant.find(".magic-thumb.magic-thumb-selected:not(.video-item)").trigger("click");
                    }else{
                        selected.trigger("click");
                    } 
                }
            }
        }
            
        jQuery(document).on('click','.MagicThumb-background',function(){
            MagicZoom.close(image_container_id);
        });

        //add 3d text
         
    });
</script>

<script>
    var alloy = diamondParam = stone = stone2 = pearl = '';
    var link = "https://www.glamira.vn/schemaorg/price/index/";
    link += 'productId/'+105066;
    if(getUrlParameter('alloy')){
    	alloy = getUrlParameter('alloy');
    	link += '/alloy/'+alloy;
    }
    if(getUrlParameter('diamond')){
    	diamondParam = getUrlParameter('diamond');
    	link += '/diamond/'+diamondParam;
    }
    if(getUrlParameter('stone')){
    	stone = getUrlParameter('stone');
    	link += '/stone/'+stone;
    }
    if(getUrlParameter('stone2')){
    	stone2= getUrlParameter('stone2');
    	link += '/stone2/'+stone2;
    }
    if(getUrlParameter('pearl')){
    	pearl= getUrlParameter('pearl');
    	link += '/pearl/'+pearl;
    }
    
    jQuery.getJSON(link, function( data ) {
    	var price = data.price.replace(/\,/g,'');
    	var content = {
	        "@context": "https://schema.org",
			"@type": "Product",
			"description": "Nhẫn Nữ Noble Shape 3 mm",

			"productID": "105066",
			"image": data.image,
			"sku": "GWD-N1034-3-W",

				"@type": "Thing",
				"name": "GLAMIRA Wedding"
			},
			"offers": {
			"@type": "Offer",
			"price": price,
			"url": "https://www.glamira.vn/nhan-nu-noble-shape-3-mm.html?stone=diamond-Zirconia",
			"priceValidUntil": "2022-01-18",
			"availability": "InStock",
			"priceCurrency": "VND"
			},
				    };

	       "type": "application/ld+json",
	       "html": JSON.stringify(content)
	     }).appendTo( "head" );
	});

    <script type="text/javascript">

        var widgetId2,gRecaptchaResponse2;

        var onloadCallback = function() {
            // Renders the HTML element with id 'example1' as a reCAPTCHA widget.
            // The id of the reCAPTCHA widget is assigned to 'widgetId1'.
            if ($('product_sendtofriend_form') && $("captchahere1")) {
                widgetId1 = grecaptcha.render(document.getElementById('captchahere1'), {
                    'sitekey' : '6LfjIBoTAAAAAHKfkXDTMLaAlKKEzCFDuaUUbcQ1'
                });
            }
            if ($('popup_form_review')) {
                widgetId2 = grecaptcha.render(document.getElementById('captchahere2'), {
                    'sitekey' : '6LfjIBoTAAAAAHKfkXDTMLaAlKKEzCFDuaUUbcQ1'
                });
            }
            if($('photo_customer_grecaptcha')){
                widgetPhotoCustomer = grecaptcha.render(document.getElementById('photo_customer_grecaptcha'), {
                    'sitekey' : '6LfjIBoTAAAAAHKfkXDTMLaAlKKEzCFDuaUUbcQ1'
                });
            }

            if (($('try-free-ring-sizer') || $('free-ring-sizer')) && $('ringSizerCaptcha')) {
                widgetId3 = grecaptcha.render(document.getElementById('ringSizerCaptcha'), {
                    'sitekey' : '6LfjIBoTAAAAAHKfkXDTMLaAlKKEzCFDuaUUbcQ1',
                    'callback' : verifyCallback3,
                    'theme' : 'light'
                });
                /*Check element id toon tai thi chay cao function call back respondive cho recapcha*/
                if (jQuery(window).width() <= 650 && document.getElementById('ringSizerEmailCaptcha')) {
                    widgetId4 = grecaptcha.render(document.getElementById('ringSizerEmailCaptcha'), {
                        'sitekey' : '6LfjIBoTAAAAAHKfkXDTMLaAlKKEzCFDuaUUbcQ1',
                        'callback' : verifyCallback4,
                        'theme' : 'light'
                    });
                }
            }

            if ($('bracelet-sizer') && $('braceletSizerCaptcha')) {
                widgetIdBraceletSizer = grecaptcha.render(document.getElementById('braceletSizerCaptcha'), {
                    'sitekey' : '6LfjIBoTAAAAAHKfkXDTMLaAlKKEzCFDuaUUbcQ1',
                    'callback' : verifyCallbackBraceletSizer,
                    'theme' : 'light'
                });
            }


            if ($('try-request-quote')) {
                widgetId5 = grecaptcha.render(document.getElementById('quotationCaptcha'), {
                    'sitekey' : '6LfjIBoTAAAAAHKfkXDTMLaAlKKEzCFDuaUUbcQ1',
                    'callback' : verifyCallback5,
                    'theme' : 'light'
                });
            }

                widgetId6 = grecaptcha.render(document.getElementById('contactCaptcha'), {
                    'sitekey' : '6LfjIBoTAAAAAHKfkXDTMLaAlKKEzCFDuaUUbcQ1',
                    'callback' : verifyCallback6,
                    'theme' : 'light'
                });
            }

            if($('customer_order_item_edit_recaptcha')){
                 widgetId7 = grecaptcha.render(document.getElementById('customer_order_item_edit_recaptcha'), {
                    'sitekey' : '6LfjIBoTAAAAAHKfkXDTMLaAlKKEzCFDuaUUbcQ1',
                    'callback' : verifyCallback7,
                    'theme' : 'light'
                });
            }


        };
        var verifyCallback3 = function(response) {
            if (jQuery('.verifyRingSizerCaptcha').length > 0) {
                jQuery('.verifyRingSizerCaptcha').val(response);
            }
        };

        var verifyCallback4 = function(response) {
            gRecaptchaResponse4 = response;
        };

<div id="cookiealert" class="cookiealert new-cookie-bar glvn-cookie-bar " style="">

    <div class="container">
    	<div class="message cookie-bar-inner">
    		<span class="cookie-title" style="display: none;">Cookie Policy</span>
    		<p class="content-cookie-bar">
    	    	Chúng tôi sử dụng cookies để giúp cho trải nghiệm của người dùng trở nên hoàn hảo hơn. Bằng cách sử dụng website này, bạn đã chấp thuận với <a href="https://www.glamira.vn/chinh-sach-cookie/">Chính sách Cookie</a> của chúng tôi    	    	<a href="" style="display: none;">Click here to learn about cookie settings.</a>
    		</p>
    		<p class="accept">
    			<a href="javascript:acceptCookieAlert();">Tôi đồng ý</a>
    		</p>
    		<p class="decline" style="display: none;">
    			<a href="javascript:declineCookieAlert();">Decline</a>
    		</p>
    	</div>
    </div>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
function closeCookieAlert() {
    Mage.Cookies.set('cookieAlertClosedFlag', 1, new Date(new Date().getTime() + (365 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000)));
    document.getElementById('cookiealert').style.display = 'none';
}

function acceptCookieAlert() {
    closeCookieAlert();
    Mage.Cookies.set('cookielaw', 1, new Date(new Date().getTime() + (365 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000)));
    loadCookieScript();
}

function declineCookieAlert() {
    closeCookieAlert();
    Mage.Cookies.set('cookielaw', 0, new Date(new Date().getTime() + (365 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000)));
}

function loadCookieScript() {
}

if (!Mage.Cookies.get('cookieAlertClosedFlag')) {
    document.getElementById('cookiealert').style.display = '';
}

if (Mage.Cookies.get('cookielaw') == 1) {
    loadCookieScript();
}

</script>

                    <strong>Dường như JavaScript bị tắt trong trình duyệt của bạn.</strong><br />
                    Bạn phải bật JavaScript để trang web có thể hoạt động hết tính năng.                </p>
            </div>

    <div class="page main-page">
        <div class="header-wrapper"> 
<div class="header-wrapper-content">
    <div class="header-container "> 
        <div class="header headder-glvn">
            <div class="top-header-container">
                <div class="top-header-geoip clearfix"></div>
                <div class="header_campaign show">
                    <div class="header_campaign_inner container">
                        <div class="campaign_header-wrap">
<div class="campaign_header-wrap-ct bannerslider-ct">
<div class="owl-carousel owl-theme ajaxloadfirst owl-loaded" id="campaign_header"><div class="owl-stage-outer"><div class="owl-stage" style="width: 1180px; transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px); transition: all 0s ease 0s;"><div class="owl-item active" style="width: 1180px;"><div class="slide-content"><a style="background:#b00024" href="https://www.glamira.vn/promo/" title="Get 10% off + Free pendant"><img alt="Get 10% off + Free pendant" class="owl-lazy" src="https://res.cloudinary.com/glamira/image/upload/c_limit,c_fill,dpr_1.0,f_auto,fl_lossy,q_auto/media/bannerslides/red_header_7_10_vn.jpg" data-src="https://res.cloudinary.com/glamira/image/upload/c_limit,c_fill,dpr_1.0,f_auto,fl_lossy,q_auto/media/bannerslides/red_header_7_10_vn.jpg" data-mobiledesc="true" style="opacity: 1;"></a></div></div></div></div><div class="owl-controls"><div class="owl-buttons disabled"><div class="owl-prev">next</div><div class="owl-next">prev</div></div><div class="owl-dots disabled"><button role="button" class="owl-dot active"><span></span></button></div></div></div>
<p><script type="text/javascript">
	jQuery(document).ready(function() {if(jQuery("#campaign_header").length){var $owlThis = jQuery("#campaign_header");if($owlThis.hasClass("ajaxloadfirst")){return;}var attrClass = $owlThis.attr('class') || false;if (typeof attrClass !== typeof undefined && attrClass !== false) {
                            $owlThis.addClass("ajaxloadfirst");
                        }else{
                            $owlThis.attr("class","ajaxloadfirst");
                        }$owlThis.owlCarousel({onLoadedLazy: function(e){
                        var $element = e.element;
                        if($element.length > 0){
                            jQuery($element).each(function(event) {
                                var attr = jQuery(this).attr('usemap') || false;
                                if (typeof attr !== typeof undefined && attr !== false) {
                                    jQuery(this).customImageMaps();
                                }
                            });
                        }
                    },onInitialized:function (event) {
                        var element = event.target;
                        jQuery(element).find('.owl-buttons, .owl-dots').wrapAll("<div class='owl-controls'></div>");
                    },nav: true,
                items: 1,
                animateOut: "fadeOut",
                navContainerClass: "owl-buttons",
                navElement:"div",
                navText:["next","prev"],
                navSpeed: 300,
                dotsSpeed: 300,
                lazyLoad: true,
                autoplay: false,
                mouseDrag: false,});jQuery.ajax({url:"https://www.glamira.vn/banners/slideshow/jsonData/identifier/campaign_header",dataType: 'json',success: function(data) {
                    if(jQuery.isArray(data) && !data.length) {
                        jQuery("#campaign_header").remove();
                        return;
                    }
                    var content = '';
                    var $owlThisLength = data.owl.length;
                    for (var i = 0;i < $owlThisLength; i++) {   
                        content = data.owl[i].item;
                        $owlThis.trigger('add.owl.carousel', [jQuery(content), i]);
                    }
                    if($owlThis.closest('.header_campaign').length){
                        var header_campaign = $owlThis.closest('.header_campaign');
                        if(header_campaign.find('.slide-content img').length){
                            header_campaign.find('.icon-wrapper').addClass('show');
                        }else{
                            header_campaign.find('.icon-wrapper').addClass('hide');
                        }
                    }
                    $owlThis.find('.slide-content img').each(function(event) {
                        var $t = jQuery(this);
                        var trust_url = $t.data('src');

                        var attr = jQuery(this).attr('usemap') || false;

                        if (trust_url && trust_url != 'undefined' && jQuery(window).width() <= 650 && ($t.attr('mobiledesc') == 'true'|| $t.attr('data-mobiledesc') == 'true')) {

                            var $attrDataSrc =  $t.attr('data-src') || false;
                            if (typeof $attrDataSrc !== typeof undefined && $attrDataSrc !== false) {
                                $t.attr('data-src', trust_url.replace(/.([^.]*)$/, '_mobile.' + '$1'));
                            }

                            if (typeof attr !== typeof undefined && attr !== false) {
                                var map = $t.attr('usemap').replace('#', ''),
                                c = 'coords',
                                cMobi = 'coordsmobi';
                                if($t.parent().find('map[name="' + map + '"]').find('area').length){
                                    $t.parent().find('map[name="' + map + '"]').find('area').each(function() {
                                        var $this = jQuery(this);
                                        if ($this.data(cMobi)){
                                            $this.attr(c, $this.data(cMobi));
                                        }
                                    });
                                }
                            }
                        }

                    });

                    var $owlThisData = $owlThis.data();
                    var $owlThisOptions = $owlThisData['owl.carousel'].options;
                    
                    if (typeof data['options'] !== 'undefined') {
                        if(typeof data['options']['autoplay'] !== 'undefined'){
                            $owlThisOptions.autoplay = true;
                        }
                    }
                    if($owlThisLength > 1){
                        $owlThisOptions.loop = true;
                    }
                    if($owlThisLength <= 1){
                        $owlThisOptions.nav = false;
                    }
                    $owlThis.trigger('initialized.owl.carousel')
                        .trigger('refresh.owl.carousel');
                    if(jQuery('.catalog-product-view').length && jQuery("#campaign_header").closest('.product-view').length){
                        jQuery('.catalog-product-view').find('#product_production_capacity a').each(function(){
                            jQuery(this).attr('target',"_blank");
                        });
                        setPositionBottomProductView();
                    }

                }});}});</script></p>

<script type="text/javascript">
//<![CDATA[
	COMPAREDATA.activeTitle = '<span class="hide-on-moblie">Đã lưu</span><span class="small-list-heard-icon">&nbsp;</span>';
    COMPAREDATA.productActiveTitle = '<span class="small-list-heard-icon">&nbsp;</span><span class="hide-on-moblie">Đã lưu</span>';
	COMPAREDATA.maximun = 10;
	COMPAREDATA.message = 'Sie können max 10 Artikel zu den Favoriten hinzufügen.';
	COMPAREDATA.url_addItem = 'https://www.glamira.vn/ajaxcompare/product_compare/getItems/';
 
	COMPAREDATA.url_addItem = COMPAREDATA.url_addItem.replace('http://','https://');
    COMPAREDATA.checkProductPage = true;
	if($$('#compare-items li.item').length < 1)
	{
		$('content_sidebar_compare').hide();
	}
jQuery(document).ready(function(){
        			hide_button_move_slide_compare();
    });	 
document.observe("dom:loaded", function() {  
	startShortList();
	$$('.category-products ul li.item a').each(function(ele){
		ele.observe('touchend', function(event){ if(Mobile.dragging == false){
					if($(this).readAttribute('href') && !$(this).hasClassName('link-compare'))
					{
						var url = $(this).readAttribute('href');
						 setLocation(url);
					}
				}
			});
	});
	
	/* end */
    var view_list = Mage.Cookies.get('COMPARE_LIST');
    if(view_list != ''){
        jQuery('.top-heard').mouseenter( function(){
            if(jQuery('#compare_sidebar #compare-items li.item').length <= 0)
                jQuery('.top-header-container .compare-link-items').show();
        } ).mouseleave( function(){
            if(jQuery('#compare_sidebar #compare-items li.item').length <= 0)
                jQuery('.top-header-container .compare-link-items').hide();
        } );    
    }else{
        jQuery('.top-heard').click(function(){ return false; });
    }        
});


//new Extention.ScrollFixed('compare_sidebar', 50);

//]]>
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var headerCampainCookieValue = 'already';
    var headerCampainCookieKey = 'top_campaign_header_dismiss';
            headerCampainCookieValue += "glvn";
        headerCampainCookieKey += "_glvn"    
    document.observe("dom:loaded", function() {
        var headerCampainCookie = Mage.Cookies.get(headerCampainCookieKey);
        if(!headerCampainCookie || headerCampainCookie!=headerCampainCookieValue) {
            if($$('.header_campaign')[0]){
                $$('.header_campaign')[0].addClassName('show');
            }
        }
    });
    if($$('.header_campaign .icon-wrapper')[0]){
        $$('.header_campaign .icon-wrapper')[0].observe('click', function(){
            var lifetime = 1*24*60*60*1000;
            var expireAt = Mage.Cookies.expires;
            expireAt = new Date();
            expireAt.setTime(expireAt.getTime() + lifetime);
            Mage.Cookies.set(headerCampainCookieKey, headerCampainCookieValue, expireAt);
            if($$('.header_campaign')[0]){
               $$('.header_campaign')[0].addClassName('hide');
            }
        });
    }
</script>                        <div class="wrapper_contain_top_breadcumbs">

	DATACUSTOM.IMAGE_LOAD_TYPE = 'layer';
	var diamondAddition = {
		getValue: function()
		{
			var quality = 'AAA';
			$$('#stone_diamonds .item_diamond_quantity.active').each(function(ele){
				quality = ele.readAttribute('data-quality');
			});
			$$('#stone_diamonds .heated-item.active-item.active_heated').each(function(ele){
				if(ele.readAttribute('data-heated') && ele.readAttribute('data-heated') != 'Heated')
					quality = quality + '_' + ele.readAttribute('data-heated');
			});
			return quality;
		}
	};
	var stone2Addition = {
		getValue: function()
		{
			var quality = 'AAA';
			$$('.stone2 .quality_container_stone2.active .item_diamond_quantity.active').each(function(ele){
				quality = ele.readAttribute('data-quality');
			});
			return quality;
		}
	};

			});

    <script type="text/javascript">
    //<![CDATA[
    $$('.related-checkbox').each(function(elem){
        Event.observe(elem, 'click', addRelatedToProduct)
    });

    var relatedProductsCheckFlag = false;
    function linkToRelatedProduct(url)
    {
		var params = new Array();
		var productRingOptions = productRelateOptionJson;
		if(typeof productRingOptions != 'undefined'){
			for (var key in productRingOptions) {
				if(getUrlParameter(key)){
					params.push(key+'=' + getUrlParameter(key));
				}
			}
		}
		if(getUrlParameter('utm_source'))
			params.push('utm_source=' + getUrlParameter('utm_source'));
		if(getUrlParameter('utm_medium'))
			params.push('utm_medium=' + getUrlParameter('utm_medium'));
		var param = '';
		if(params.length)
			param = '?' + params.join('&');
		url = url + param;
        window.location.href = url;
    }
    document.observe("dom:loaded", function() {
		activeRelatedTab();
    });
    //]]>
    </script>
</div>
							 
								<div class="related_enable">
															<script type="text/javascript">

jQuery(window).load(function(){
	//add class check is compare
		//inset image to sizing guide

	jQuery('.sizing_guide_right > div').removeClass("active");
	jQuery('.sizing_guide_right').find('div[data-type]:not(".disabled-guide"):first').addClass("active");
	jQuery('.sizing_guide_left').find('div[data-type]:not(".disabled-guide"):first').addClass('active');


	jQuery(".sizing_guide_left > div").on("click", function(){
		var type = jQuery(this).attr("data-type");
        jQuery(".sizing_guide_left > div").removeClass("active");
        jQuery(".sizing_guide_right > div").removeClass("active");
        jQuery(this).addClass("active");

        jQuery(".sizing_guide_right").find("div[data-type='"+type+"']").addClass("active");
        if(type == 'viewimagecustomer' && jQuery('#customer_thumb_guide .owl-item > img').length > 0)
        {
            jQuery('#customer_thumb_guide .owl-item.active').trigger('click');
            jQuery('#customer_thumb_guide .owl-item > img').first().trigger('click');
        }
    }); 

	// load Video before click
	if (jQuery('#view_video_production').length) {
		showVideoIconStoneAlloy(jQuery(".thumb-video-production"));

		jQuery('#view_video_production').on("click", function(){
			var _this = jQuery(this);
			if(!_this.hasClass('firstClickVideo'))
			{
				_this.addClass('firstClickVideo');
				var pathVideoLoadBefore = jQuery(".view_video_production_content .view_image_thumb .thumb-video-1").data("video");
				jQuery(".view_video_production_content .view_image_thumb .thumb-video-1").addClass('active');
				changeTitleStoneAlloy(jQuery(".view_video_production_content .view_image_thumb .thumb-video-1"));
			    jQuery('#video_production_finished').find('#video').attr("src", pathVideoLoadBefore);
				var videoLoadBefore = jQuery("#video_production_finished");
				videoLoadBefore[0].load();
			}
		});
	}
	
});
function playVideoProduction(element){
	if(!element){
		return;
	}
	
	var videoLoadBefore = jQuery("#video_production_finished");
	if(typeof(videoLoadBefore) != "undefined" && videoLoadBefore !== null) {
    	videoLoadBefore[0].play();
    	element.hide();
	}
    return;
};
function changeTitleStoneAlloy(ele){
	if(ele.length){
		if(ele.hasClass('active')){
	    	var title = '';
	    	var stoneQuality = '';
	    	var hasAlloy = false;
			var hasStone = false;
	    	if(typeof ele.attr('data-alloycolour') != typeof undefined && ele.attr('data-alloycolour') !== false){
	    		hasAlloy = true;
	    		title += '<span>' + ele.attr('data-alloycolour') + '</span>';
	    	}

	    	if(typeof ele.attr('data-stone') != typeof undefined && ele.attr('data-stone') !== false){
	    		hasStone = true;
	    		title += ' / ' + '<span>' + ele.attr('data-stone') + '</span>';
	    	}

	    	if(typeof ele.attr('data-stonequality') != typeof undefined && ele.attr('data-stonequality') !== false){
	    		stoneQuality += ele.attr('data-stonequality');
	    	}

	    	if(!hasStone && hasAlloy){
	    		title += ' / ' + '<span>' + Translator.translate("ohne Stein") + '</span>';
	    	}

	    	jQuery('.dimension_v_short-description').html(title);
	    	if(stoneQuality){
	    		jQuery('#dimensionStoneQuatity').html(stoneQuality);
	    		jQuery('.dimension_v_stone_quality').show();
	    	}else{
	    		jQuery('.dimension_v_stone_quality').hide();
	    	}
	    	
	    }
	}
}

function showVideoIconStoneAlloy(ele){
	if(ele.length){
		ele.each(function(){
			var _this = jQuery(this);
			var html = '';
			var hasAlloy = false;
			var hasStone = false;

	    	if(typeof _this.attr('data-alloycoloursku') != typeof undefined && _this.attr('data-alloycoloursku') !== false){
	    		hasAlloy = true;
	    		var alloyImgSrc = getImageWithAlloySku(_this.attr('data-alloycoloursku'));
	    		if(alloyImgSrc){
	    			html += "<img class='thumbiconalloy' ";
	    			html += "src='"+alloyImgSrc+"'";
	    			html += "/>"
	    		}
	    	}

	    	if(typeof _this.attr('data-stonesku') != typeof undefined && _this.attr('data-stonesku') !== false){
	    		hasStone = true;
	    		var stoneImgSrc = getImageWithStoneSku(_this.attr('data-stonesku'));
	    		if(stoneImgSrc){
					html += "<img class='thumbiconstone' ";
	    			html += "src='"+stoneImgSrc+"'";
	    			html += "/>"
	    		}
	    	}

	    	if(!hasStone && hasAlloy){
	    		var stoneImgSrc = getImageWithStoneSku('none');
	    		if(stoneImgSrc){
					html += "<img class='thumbiconstone' ";
	    			html += "src='"+stoneImgSrc+"'";
	    			html += "/>"
	    		}
	    	}

	    	if(html){
	    		_this.addClass('change_thumbicon_video');
	    		_this.html(html);
	    	}
		});
	}
}

function getImageWithAlloySku($alloySku){
	var html = '';
	var alloySku = $alloySku || false;
	if(alloySku){
		if(alloySku.indexOf('-') != -1){
			var colourArr = alloySku.split('-');
			if(colourArr.length > 1){
				var colour = jQuery.trim(colourArr[0]);
				if($('alloy_colour')){
					if($('alloy_colour').down(".wrap_alloy_colour li[data-ring='"+colour+"']")){
						var colourItem = $('alloy_colour').down(".wrap_alloy_colour li[data-ring='"+colour+"']");
						if(colourItem.down("img").readAttribute('src') && (colourItem.down("img").readAttribute('src').indexOf("images/px.gif") == -1)){
							html = colourItem.down("img").readAttribute('src');
						}else if(colourItem.down("img").readAttribute('data-src')){
							html = colourItem.down("img").readAttribute('data-src');
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	

	return html;
}

function getImageWithStoneSku($stoneSku){
	var html = '';
	var stoneSku = $stoneSku;
	var stoneItem = '';
	if($('stone_diamonds')){
		stoneItem = $('stone_diamonds').down(".options-list li[data-sku='"+stoneSku+"']");
	}else if($('damenringsteinbesatz')){
		stoneItem = $('damenringsteinbesatz').down(".options-list li[data-sku='"+stoneSku+"']");
	}else if($('herrenringsteinbesatz')){
		stoneItem = $('herrenringsteinbesatz').down(".options-list li[data-sku='"+stoneSku+"']");
	}
	if(stoneItem){
		if(stoneItem.down("img").readAttribute('src') && (stoneItem.down("img").readAttribute('src').indexOf("images/px.gif") == -1)){
			html = stoneItem.down("img").readAttribute('src');
		}else if(stoneItem.down("img").readAttribute('data-src')){
			html = stoneItem.down("img").readAttribute('data-src');
		}
	}else{
	    if(stoneSku){
	        var path = "https://res.cloudinary.com/glamira/image/upload/c_limit,c_fill,dpr_1.0,f_auto,fl_lossy,q_auto/media/diamonds/stone_diamonds_new/";
	        html = path + stoneSku + '.png';
        }
    }

	return html;
}

<script type="text/javascript">

    function prevnextThumb(parentElment , state){
        var position = jQuery(parentElment).data('ring');
        var current_element;
        var main_image = '';
        var big_image = '';
        var thumb_count;
        
        thumb_count = jQuery('.MagicToolboxSelectorsContainer .MagicThumb-swap').length;
        
        if(state == "next"){
            if( thumb_count == parseFloat(position)+1 ){
                jQuery(parentElment).data('ring',0);
            }else{
                jQuery(parentElment).data('ring',parseFloat(position) + 1);
            }
        }else{
            if( parseFloat(position) - 1 < 0 ){
                jQuery(parentElment).data('ring', thumb_count-1 );
            }else{
                jQuery(parentElment).data('ring',parseFloat(position) - 1);    
            }
        }
        
        var current_position = jQuery(parentElment).data('ring');
        
        current_element = jQuery('.MagicToolboxSelectorsContainer .MagicThumb-swap:eq('+current_position+')');
        
        main_image = jQuery(current_element).attr('rev');
        big_image = jQuery(current_element).attr('href');
        
        jQuery('.MagicZoomPlus > img').attr('src',main_image);
        jQuery('.MagicBoxGlow').find('img:first').attr('src',big_image);
    }
    jQuery(document).ready(function(){
        
    });
    
	
	
</script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
//<![CDATA[
var DateOption = Class.create({

    getDaysInMonth: function(month, year)
    {
        var curDate = new Date();
        if (!month) {
            month = curDate.getMonth();
        }
        if (2 == month && !year) { // leap year assumption for unknown year
            return 29;
        }
        if (!year) {
            year = curDate.getFullYear();
        }
        return 32 - new Date(year, month - 1, 32).getDate();
    },

    reloadMonth: function(event)
    {
        var selectEl = event.findElement();
        var idParts = selectEl.id.split("_");
        if (idParts.length != 3) {
            return false;
        }
        var optionIdPrefix = idParts[0] + "_" + idParts[1];
        var month = parseInt($(optionIdPrefix + "_month").value);
        var year = parseInt($(optionIdPrefix + "_year").value);
        var dayEl = $(optionIdPrefix + "_day");

        var days = this.getDaysInMonth(month, year);

        //remove days
        for (var i = dayEl.options.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
            if (dayEl.options[i].value > days) {
                dayEl.remove(dayEl.options[i].index);
            }
        }

        // add days
        var lastDay = parseInt(dayEl.options[dayEl.options.length-1].value);
        for (i = lastDay + 1; i <= days; i++) {
            this.addOption(dayEl, i, i);
        }
    },

    addOption: function(select, text, value)
    {
        var option = document.createElement('OPTION');
        option.value = value;
        option.text = text;

        if (select.options.add) {
            select.options.add(option);
        } else {
            select.appendChild(option);
        }
    }
});
dateOption = new DateOption();
//]]>
</script>

    <script type="text/javascript">//<![CDATA[
    
    var optionFileUpload = {
        productForm : $('product_addtocart_form'),
        formAction : '',
        formElements : {},
        upload : function(element){
            this.formElements = this.productForm.select('input', 'select', 'textarea', 'button');
            this.removeRequire(element.readAttribute('id').sub('option_', ''));

            template = '<iframe id="upload_target" name="upload_target" style="width:0; height:0; border:0;"><\/iframe>';

            Element.insert($('option_'+element.readAttribute('id').sub('option_', '')+'_uploaded_file'), {after: template});

            this.formAction = this.productForm.action;

            var baseUrl = 'https://www.glamira.vn/catalog/product/upload/';
            var urlExt = 'option_id/'+element.readAttribute('id').sub('option_', '');

            this.productForm.action = parseSidUrl(baseUrl, urlExt);
            this.productForm.target = 'upload_target';
            this.productForm.submit();
            this.productForm.target = '';
            this.productForm.action = this.formAction;
        },
        removeRequire : function(skipElementId){
            for(var i=0; i<this.formElements.length; i++){
                if (this.formElements[i].readAttribute('id') != 'option_'+skipElementId+'_file' && this.formElements[i].type != 'button') {
                    this.formElements[i].disabled='disabled';
                }
            }
        },
        addRequire : function(skipElementId){
            for(var i=0; i<this.formElements.length; i++){
                if (this.formElements[i].readAttribute('name') != 'options_'+skipElementId+'_file' && this.formElements[i].type != 'button') {
                    this.formElements[i].disabled='';
                }
            }
        },
        uploadCallback : function(data){
            this.addRequire(data.optionId);
            $('upload_target').remove();

            if (data.error) {

            } else {
                $('option_'+data.optionId+'_uploaded_file').value = data.fileName;
                $('option_'+data.optionId+'_file').value = '';
                $('option_'+data.optionId+'_file').hide();
                $('option_'+data.optionId+'').hide();
                template = '<div id="option_'+data.optionId+'_file_box"><a href="#"><img src="var/options/'+data.fileName+'" alt=""><\/a><a href="#" onclick="optionFileUpload.removeFile('+data.optionId+')" title="Remove file" \/>Remove file<\/a>';

                Element.insert($('option_'+data.optionId+'_uploaded_file'), {after: template});
            }
        },
        removeFile : function(optionId)
        {
            $('option_'+optionId+'_uploaded_file').value= '';
            $('option_'+optionId+'_file').show();
            $('option_'+optionId+'').show();

            $('option_'+optionId+'_file_box').remove();
        }
    }
    var optionTextCounter = {
        count : function(field,cntfield,maxlimit){
            if (field.value.length > maxlimit){
                field.value = field.value.substring(0, maxlimit);
            } else {
                cntfield.innerHTML = maxlimit - field.value.length;
            }
        }
    }

    Product.Options = Class.create();
    Product.Options.prototype = {
        initialize : function(config) {
            this.config = config;
            this.reloadPrice();
            document.observe("dom:loaded", this.reloadPrice.bind(this));
        },
        reloadPrice : function() {
            var config = this.config;
			// start price percent/percent and percent/abs
			var productPrice = optionsPrice.productPrice;
			// end
            var skipIds = [];
			var valueIdsSelected = [];
            $$('body .product-custom-option').each(function(element){
                var optionId = 0;
                element.name.sub(/[0-9]+/, function(match){
                    optionId = parseInt(match[0], 10);
                });
                if (config[optionId]) {
                    var configOptions = config[optionId];
                    var curConfig = {price: 0, type: 'fixed', oldPrice: 0};
                    if (element.type == 'checkbox' || element.type == 'radio') {
                        if (element.checked) {
                            if (typeof configOptions[element.getValue()] != 'undefined') {
                                curConfig = configOptions[element.getValue()];
                                valueIdsSelected.push(element.getValue());
                            }

                            // custom price for stone quality
                            var optionQualitys = $$('input[name="stone_quality_options[' + optionId +']"]');
                            var optionGias = $$('input[name="GIA_options[' + optionId +']"]');
                            var synthetic = $$('input[name="synthetic_options[' + optionId +']"]');
                            var _priceOpt = 0;
                            var isNewPrice = false;
                            var newPriceType = 'fixed';
                            if(optionQualitys.length){
                                optionQualitys.each(function(ele){
                                    if(ele.readAttribute("type") == "radio"){
                                        if(ele.checked && ele.readAttribute('data-price') && ele.getValue()){
                                            _priceOpt = parseInt(ele.readAttribute('data-price'));
                                            isNewPrice = true;
                                        }
                                    }else if(ele.readAttribute('data-price') && ele.getValue()){
                                        _priceOpt = parseInt(ele.readAttribute('data-price'));
                                        isNewPrice = true;
                                    }
                                });
                            }else if(optionGias.length){
                                optionGias.each(function(ele){
                                    if(ele.readAttribute('data-price') && ele.getValue()){
                                        _priceOpt = parseInt(ele.readAttribute('data-price'));
                                        isNewPrice = true;
                                    }
                                });
                            }else if(synthetic.length){
                                synthetic.each(function(ele){
                                    if(ele.readAttribute('data-price') && ele.getValue()){
                                        _priceOpt = parseInt(ele.readAttribute('data-price'));
                                        isNewPrice = true;
                                    }
                                });
                            }
                            if(isNewPrice)
                            {
                                curConfig = {price: _priceOpt, type: newPriceType};
                                if(optionsPrice.productPrice != optionsPrice.priceInclTax)
                                {
                                    curConfig.excludeTax = _priceOpt;
                                    curConfig.includeTax = curConfig.price + (curConfig.price * optionsPrice.currentTax )/100;
                                }
                            }
                            // end;
                        }
                    } else if(element.hasClassName('datetime-picker') && !skipIds.include(optionId)) {
                        dateSelected = true;
                        $$('.product-custom-option[id^="options_' + optionId + '"]').each(function(dt){
                            if (dt.getValue() == '') {
                                dateSelected = false;
                            }
                        });
                        if (dateSelected) {
                            curConfig = configOptions;
                            skipIds[optionId] = optionId;
                        }
                    } else if(element.type == 'select-one' || element.type == 'select-multiple') {
                        if ('options' in element) {
                            $A(element.options).each(function(selectOption){
                                if ('selected' in selectOption && selectOption.selected) {
                                    if (typeof(configOptions[selectOption.value]) != 'undefined') {
                                        curConfig = configOptions[selectOption.value];
                                        valueIdsSelected.push(selectOption.value);
                                    }
                                }
                            });
                        }
                    } else {
                        if (element.getValue().strip() != '') {
                            curConfig = configOptions;
                        }
                    }
                    // implement price percent / percent and percent / abs
                    if(curConfig.type =='percent')
                    {
                        curConfig.price = Math.floor(productPrice * curConfig.oldPrice /100);
                        curConfig.excludeTax = curConfig.price;
                        curConfig.includeTax = Math.floor(productPrice * curConfig.oldPrice /100);
                        if(optionsPrice.productPrice != optionsPrice.priceInclTax)
                        {
                            curConfig.excludeTax = curConfig.price;
                            curConfig.includeTax = curConfig.price + (curConfig.price * optionsPrice.currentTax )/100;
                        }
                        productPrice = productPrice + curConfig.price;
                    }
                    else if(curConfig.type =='abs')
                    {
                        productPrice = optionsPrice.productPrice + curConfig.price;
                    }
				                					// end
                    if(element.type == 'select-multiple' && ('options' in element)) {
                        $A(element.options).each(function(selectOption) {
                            if (('selected' in selectOption) && typeof(configOptions[selectOption.value]) != 'undefined') {
                                if (selectOption.selected) {
                                    curConfig = configOptions[selectOption.value];
                                } else {
                                    curConfig = {price: 0};
                                }
                                optionsPrice.addCustomPrices(optionId + '-' + selectOption.value, curConfig);
                            }
                        });
                    } else {
                        optionsPrice.addCustomPrices(element.id || optionId, curConfig);
                    }
                }
            });
            optionsPrice.reload();
        }
    }
    function validateOptionsCallback(elmId, result) {
        var container = $(elmId).up('ul.options-list');
        if (result == 'failed') {
            container.removeClassName('validation-passed');
            container.addClassName('validation-failed');
        } else {
            container.removeClassName('validation-failed');
            container.addClassName('validation-passed');
        }
    }

white_red" data-weight="legie_375" data-alloy="375" data-combine="" data-ring="375">Vàng 375 <span class="seperate-line">-</span> <span>9K</span></li><li class="legie_585 single white_yellow yellow_white white yellow red red_white white_red" data-weight="legie_585" data-alloy="585" data-combine="" data-ring="585">Vàng 585 <span class="seperate-line">-</span> <span>14K</span></li><li class="legie_750 single white_yellow yellow_white white yellow red red_white white_red active" data-weight="legie_750" data-alloy="750" data-combine="" data-ring="750">Vàng 750 <span class="seperate-line">-</span> <span>18K</span></li><li class="legie_platin single white disabled" data-weight="legie_platin" data-alloy="platin" data-combine="" data-ring="platin">Bạch Kim 950</li><li class="legie_palladium single white disabled" data-weight="legie_palladium" data-alloy="palladium" data-combine="" data-ring="palladium">950 Palladium</li><li class="legie_silber single white disabled" data-weight="legie_silber" data-alloy="silber" data-combine="" data-ring="silber">Bạc 925</li><li class="legie_platin_combine double white_red white_yellow red_white yellow_white yellow_white red_white disabled" data-weight="legie_silber_375" data-alloy="silber_combine" data-combine="375" data-ring="silber_375">Bạc 925 &amp; Vàng</li></ul><div class="wrapper-gold-combine"><p class="product-option-label alloy-combine" style="display:none;">Chọn vàng<span id="alloy_combine_info" data-class-popup="alloy_combine_data" class="alloy_combine_info attr_detail_icon help_icon enable-popover">&nbsp;</span></p><ul class="wrapper-alloy-combine alloy-combine" style="display: none;"><li class="alloy_375 platin_combine silber_combine" data-weight="alloy_375" data-alloy="375" data-ring="platin_375">Vàng 375 <span class="seperate-line">-</span> <span>9K</span></li><li class="alloy_585 platin_combine" data-weight="alloy_585" data-alloy="585" data-ring="platin_585">Vàng 585 <span class="seperate-line">-</span> <span>14K</span></li><li class="alloy_750 platin_combine" data-weight="alloy_750" data-alloy="750" data-ring="platin_750">Vàng 750 <span class="seperate-line">-</span> <span>18K</span></li></ul></div></div>
<div class="stone_explanation_mobile yellow-750_contents_container no-active" style="display: none;"><p class="show_hide_explain" onclick="showMobileExplain('#alloy_colour');"><span class="text">Thông Tin Về Hợp Kim</span><span class="dropdown_diamond_des"></span></p><div class="wrap_alloy_color_explanation"><div class="content_alloy_color_explanation"><p class="alloy_color_explanation_image"><img src="https://res.cloudinary.com/glamira/image/upload/c_limit,c_fill,dpr_1.0,f_auto,fl_lossy,q_auto/media/color_explanation/yellow-750.png" alt=""></p>
<p class="title">Vàng 750</p>
<div class="content">Các phân loại 18K, 14K, hoặc 9K cho thấy có bao nhiêu vàng tinh khiết có trong hỗn hợp hợp kim. Vàng 24K được gọi là vàng nguyên chất 100%. Hệ thống được sử dụng để chỉ ra bao nhiêu vàng tinh khiết được tìm thấy trong một sản phẩm:<br> Vàng 750 - 18K vàng có chứa 18 phần vàng và 6 phần của (các) kim hợp kim khác, thường biến đổi theo bạc, đồng, kẽm, platin hoặc palladium, tạo thành vàng 75%.</div>
</div></div></div></div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
		//<![CDATA[
		document.observe('dom:loaded', function(event){
			if(typeof StoneQualityObj != 'undefined'){
				var stoneQualityCallBack = {
					afterClickQuality : function(element){
						//update detail
						if($('detail_damenringsteinbesatz')){
							var cut = element.readAttribute('data-cut');
							var clarity = element.readAttribute('data-clarity');
							if($('detail_damenringsteinbesatz').down('[data-attr="clarity"]')){
								$('detail_damenringsteinbesatz').down('[data-attr="clarity"]').down('.data').innerHTML = clarity;
							}
							if($('detail_damenringsteinbesatz').down('[data-attr="cut"]')){
								$('detail_damenringsteinbesatz').down('[data-attr="cut"]').down('.data').innerHTML = cut;
							}
						}
						return false;
					}
				};
				new StoneQualityObj('.damenringsteinbesatz', 'stone', stoneQualityCallBack);
			}
		});


		// ]]>
	</script>

		<script type="text/javascript">//<![CDATA[
		<!-- Add by Andrew -->
		function disableEnterKey(e)
		{
			var key;
			if(window.event)
				key = window.event.keyCode;  //IE
			else
				key = e.which;  //firefox
			if(key == 13)
				return false;
			else
				return true;
		}

		var	BASEIMAGEPOSITION = 1;

<div id="content_popup_ship_content" class="modal fade in">
    <div class="modal-dialog">
        <div class="modal-content">
            <div class="modal-header">
                <p class="modal-title heading">Thời gian giao hàng ước tính</p>
                <a class="close_icon" data-dismiss="modal">Đóng </a>
            </div>
            <div class="modal-body">
                <div id="content_popup_ship">
                                            <p style="padding-left: 30px;">Thời gian giao hàng ước tính trên trang này được tính tự động dựa trên thời gian sản xuất và thời gian vận chuyển gần đúng với giả định rằng đơn đặt hàng sẽ được xử lý thành công ngay hôm nay. Ngày giao hàng thực tế có thể khác nhau tùy thuộc vào địa điểm giao hàng và trạng thái thanh toán của bạn.</p>
<p style="padding-left: 30px;">Đơn đặt hàng của bạn sẽ được xử lý ngay khi giao dịch thanh toán của bạn hoàn tất. Trong trường hợp giao dịch thanh toán của bạn bị trì hoãn hoặc lệnh được thực hiện qua chuyển khoản ngân hàng, thời gian giao hàng dự kiến sẽ được tính toán lại kể từ ngày thanh toán của bạn được nhận.</p>
<p style="padding-left: 30px;">Để biết thêm thông tin về quy trình giao hàng của chúng tôi, vui lòng đọc <a href="https://www.glamira.vn/shipping-policy/" title="Shipping Policy.">Chính sách giao hàng</a> của chúng tôi.</p>                                    </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Tuy nhiên, đôi khi có thể xảy ra sự chậm trễ ngắn vì những hạn chế do đại dịch đang diễn ra ở một số khu vực.                 <div id="content_product_popup_extended_return">

<p style="margin-bottom: 30px;">Có hiệu lực cho các đơn đặt hàng từ ngày 23 tháng 10 năm 2020. Điều kiện trả lại áp dụng cho các yêu cầu hoàn tiền. Vui lòng tham khảo phần Rút tiền bằng cách nhấp vào <a href="https://www.glamira.vn/return-policy/" title="Return">đây</a>.</p>                </div>

                            $owlThis.addClass("ajaxloadfirst");
                        }else{
                            $owlThis.attr("class","ajaxloadfirst");
                        }$owlThis.owlCarousel({onLoadedLazy: function(e){
                        var $element = e.element;
                        if($element.length > 0){
                            jQuery($element).each(function(event) {
                                var attr = jQuery(this).attr('usemap') || false;
                                if (typeof attr !== typeof undefined && attr !== false) {
                                    jQuery(this).customImageMaps();
                                }
                            });
                        }
                    },onInitialized:function (event) {
                        var element = event.target;
                        jQuery(element).find('.owl-buttons, .owl-dots').wrapAll("<div class='owl-controls'></div>");
                    },nav: true,
                items: 1,
                animateOut: "fadeOut",
                navContainerClass: "owl-buttons",

                autoplay: false,
                mouseDrag: false,});jQuery.ajax({url:"https://www.glamira.vn/banners/slideshow/jsonData/identifier/product_production_capacity",dataType: 'json',success: function(data) {
                    if(jQuery.isArray(data) && !data.length) {
                        jQuery("#product_production_capacity").remove();
                        return;
                    }
                    var content = '';
                    var $owlThisLength = data.owl.length;
                    for (var i = 0;i < $owlThisLength; i++) {   
                        content = data.owl[i].item;
                        $owlThis.trigger('add.owl.carousel', [jQuery(content), i]);
                    }
                    if($owlThis.closest('.header_campaign').length){
                        var header_campaign = $owlThis.closest('.header_campaign');
                        if(header_campaign.find('.slide-content img').length){
                            header_campaign.find('.icon-wrapper').addClass('show');
                        }else{
                            header_campaign.find('.icon-wrapper').addClass('hide');
                        }
                    }
                    $owlThis.find('.slide-content img').each(function(event) {
                        var $t = jQuery(this);
                        var trust_url = $t.data('src');

                        var attr = jQuery(this).attr('usemap') || false;

                        if (trust_url && trust_url != 'undefined' && jQuery(window).width() <= 650 && ($t.attr('mobiledesc') == 'true'|| $t.attr('data-mobiledesc') == 'true')) {

                            var $attrDataSrc =  $t.attr('data-src') || false;
                            if (typeof $attrDataSrc !== typeof undefined && $attrDataSrc !== false) {
                                $t.attr('data-src', trust_url.replace(/.([^.]*)$/, '_mobile.' + '$1'));
                            }

                            if (typeof attr !== typeof undefined && attr !== false) {
                                var map = $t.attr('usemap').replace('#', ''),
                                c = 'coords',
                                cMobi = 'coordsmobi';
                                if($t.parent().find('map[name="' + map + '"]').find('area').length){

                                        var $this = jQuery(this);
                                        if ($this.data(cMobi)){
                                            $this.attr(c, $this.data(cMobi));
                                        }
                                    });
                                }
                            }
                        }

                    });

                    var $owlThisData = $owlThis.data();
                    var $owlThisOptions = $owlThisData['owl.carousel'].options;
                    
                    if (typeof data['options'] !== 'undefined') {
                        if(typeof data['options']['autoplay'] !== 'undefined'){
                            $owlThisOptions.autoplay = true;
                        }
                    }
                    if($owlThisLength > 1){
                        $owlThisOptions.loop = true;
                    }
                    if($owlThisLength <= 1){
                        $owlThisOptions.nav = false;
                    }
                    $owlThis.trigger('initialized.owl.carousel')
                        .trigger('refresh.owl.carousel');

                        jQuery('.catalog-product-view').find('#product_production_capacity a').each(function(){
                            jQuery(this).attr('target',"_blank");
                        });
                        setPositionBottomProductView();

<script type="text/javascript">
	document.observe("dom:loaded", function() {
	  	if($('custom-ringsize-wrap')){
	  		if($('custom-ringsize-wrap').down('.average-ringsize-info')){
	  			if($('custom-ringsize-wrap').down('.ringsize-average-size'))
	  			{
	  				$('custom-ringsize-wrap').down('.ringsize-average-size').show();
	  				if($('custom-ringsize-wrap').down('.ringsize-average-size').down('input[name=average_size]')){
	  					var input = $('custom-ringsize-wrap').down('.ringsize-average-size').down('input[name=average_size]');
	  					if(input.value){
	  						var spanIcon = $('custom-ringsize-wrap').down('.ringsize-average-size').down('.icon_checkbox');
	  						if(!spanIcon.hasClassName('checked')){
	  							spanIcon.addClassName('checked');
	  						}
	  					}
	  				}
	  			}
	  		}
	  	}
	  	if (jQuery(window).width() < 650) {
	  	 	callPopOvers('.ringsize-average-size', '.attr_detail_icon', 'right'); 
	  	}
	});
	var averageSize = {
		unTick: function(element){
			if(!element){
				return;
			}
		    if(element.up('#custom-ringsize-wrap').down('.ringsize-average-size span.icon_checkbox')){
                var spanIcon = element.up('#custom-ringsize-wrap').down('.ringsize-average-size span.icon_checkbox');
                var inputAverage = element.up('.input-box').down('input.average-ringsize-info');
                if(inputAverage)
                {
                	var value = element.getValue();
                    var dataAverage = JSON.parse(inputAverage.value);
                    if(dataAverage.value && (value != dataAverage.value))
                    {
                        if(spanIcon.hasClassName('checked'))
                        {
                            spanIcon.removeClassName('checked');
                        }
                        var inputRequest = element.up('#custom-ringsize-wrap').down('.ringsize-average-size input[name=average_size]');
                        inputRequest.setValue('');
                    }
                }
            }
		}
	};
	function changeOptionRingsize(element){
		if(element.up('label.active')){
			return false;
		}
		var listValues = new Array();
		var type = element.getValue();
		var dataValues = element.up('.option-list').down("select").readAttribute("data-values"); 
		var onlyDisplayInstock = element.up('.option-list').down("select").hasClassName("only-display-instock"); 
		var select = element.up('.option-list').down("select").readAttribute("data-select");
		var dataRingSize = sizejson[select];
		if(typeof dataRingSize == 'undefined'){
			return false;
		}
		element.up('.btn-ringsize-group').down('label.active').removeClassName('active');
		element.up('label').addClassName("active");

		element.up('.option-list').down("select").select('option').each(function(ele){
			if(ele.readAttribute('value') && ele.readAttribute('value') != 'custom_size'){
				if(ele.readAttribute('value') && !dataValues)
					listValues.push(ele.readAttribute('value'));
				ele.remove();
			}
		});
		if(dataValues)
			listValues = dataValues.split('|');
		if(onlyDisplayInstock)
		{
			dataRingSize[type].forEach(function(item){
				if(listValues.indexOf(item.value.toString()) != -1)
				{
					var option = new Element('option', {value: item.value}).update(item.title);
					option.setAttribute('data-diameter', item.diameter);
					if(element.up('.option-list').down("select").down('option[value="custom_size"]')){
						element.up('.option-list').down("select").down('option[value="custom_size"]').insert({'before':option});
					}else{
						element.up('.option-list').down("select").insert({'bottom':option});
					}				
				}
			});
		}else
		{
			dataRingSize[type].forEach(function(item){
				var option = new Element('option', {value: item.value}).update(item.title);
				option.setAttribute('data-diameter', item.diameter);
				if(element.up('.option-list').down("select").down('option[value="custom_size"]')){
					element.up('.option-list').down("select").down('option[value="custom_size"]').insert({'before':option});
				}else{
					element.up('.option-list').down("select").insert({'bottom':option});
				}	
			});
		}
		if(element.up('.option-list').down("select")){
			averageSize.unTick(element.up('.option-list').down("select"));
			productViewDetailRingsizeOption.reUpdateDropdownRingsizeDetail(element.up('.option-list').down("select"));
		}
	}
	function changeDiameter(select){
		var value = select.getValue();
		var diameter = select.down('option[value="'+value+'"]').readAttribute('data-diameter');
		select.up().down('input.input-diameter').setValue(diameter);
	}

	function changeAverageSize(element)
    {
    	if(!element)
    	{
    		return;
    	}
		if(element.down('.icon_checkbox') && !element.down('.icon_checkbox').hasClassName('checked')){
			if(element.up('.ringsize-average-size')){
				if(element.up('.ringsize-average-size').down('input[name=average_size]')){
					element.up('.ringsize-average-size').down('input[name=average_size]').setValue(1);
				}
			}
			element.down('.icon_checkbox').addClassName('checked');
		}
        var optionList = element.up('#custom-ringsize-wrap').select(".option-list");

        if(optionList.length){
        	var optLength = optionList.length;
        	for (var i = 0,l = optLength; i < l; i++) {
        		var selectEle = optionList[i].down('select');
        		var input =  optionList[i].down('input.average-ringsize-info');
        		if(!input){
                	continue;
                }
                var data = JSON.parse(input.value);
                if(!data){
                	continue;
                }
             	selectEle.setValue(data.value);
	            var e = new Event("change");
	            selectEle.dispatchEvent(e);   
        	}
        }
    }

	function disableEnterKey(e)
	{
		var key;
		if(window.event)
			key = window.event.keyCode;  //IE
		else
			key = e.which;  //firefox
		if(key == 13)
			return false;
		else
			return true;
	}

			// jQuery('<option>', {
		// 	value: 'custom_size',
		// 	text: 'Custom Size'
		// }).insertAfter(jQuery('#select_275607 option:last'));
		
		jQuery('#select_275607 ').on('change', function(event){
			if(jQuery(this).val() == 'custom_size')
			{						
				jQuery('<div class="wrapper_customsize" id="wrapper_custom_275607">', {}).insertAfter(jQuery(this)).append(	 
					jQuery('<input>', {
						name: 'custom_size_275607',
						onKeyPress: 'return disableEnterKey(event)',
						value: jQuery('#select_275607 ').attr('data-custom_size'),
						placeholder: "Write Your Ring Size"
					}).addClass('required-entry')
				).append(jQuery('<span class="popover-customsize attr_detail enable-popover" data-toggle="popover" data-class-popup="popover-customsize">' , {}).html('[i]'));
				jQuery('#wrapper_custom_275607').parents('.optionSelect').addClass('enable-customsize');
				setPositionBottomProductView();
			}else
			{
				jQuery('#wrapper_custom_275607').parents('.optionSelect').removeClass('enable-customsize');
				jQuery('#wrapper_custom_275607').remove();
				setPositionBottomProductView();
			}
		});
		if(jQuery('#select_275607 ').attr('data-custom_size'))
		{
			jQuery('#select_275607 ').val('custom_size');
			jQuery('<div class="wrapper_customsize" id="wrapper_custom_275607">', {}).insertAfter(jQuery('#select_275607 ')).append(	 
					jQuery('<input>', {
						name: 'custom_size_275607',
						value: jQuery('#select_275607 ').attr('data-custom_size'),
						placeholder: "Write Your Ring Size"
					}).addClass('required-entry')
				).append(jQuery('<span class="popover-customsize attr_detail enable-popover" data-toggle="popover" data-class-popup="popover-customsize">' , {}).html('[i]'));
			
			jQuery('#wrapper_custom_275607').parents('.optionSelect').addClass('enable-customsize');
			setPositionBottomProductView();
		}
	
</script>

			            <div class="social_box_mobile">
			                <p class="icon_social_box_mobile"></p>

<div class="modal fade in" id="popup_coupon_discount_10_percent" style="display: none;">
	<div class="modal-dialog">
		<div class="modal-content">
			<div class="modal-body">
				<div id="popup_coupon_discount_selection">
					<a class="close_icon">x</a>
					<div class="owl-carousel owl-theme ajaxloadfirst owl-loaded" id="glamira-gift"><div class="owl-stage-outer"><div class="owl-stage" style="width: 100px; transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px); transition: all 0s ease 0s;"><div class="owl-item active" style="width: 100px;"><div class="slide-content"><a style="background:#f6f6f6" title="GLAMIRA Gift 18-19 January"><img alt="GLAMIRA Gift 18-19 January" class="owl-lazy" src="https://res.cloudinary.com/glamira/image/upload/c_limit,c_fill,dpr_1.0,f_auto,fl_lossy,q_auto/media/bannerslides/lp_18_19_january_21_vn.jpg" data-src="https://res.cloudinary.com/glamira/image/upload/c_limit,c_fill,dpr_1.0,f_auto,fl_lossy,q_auto/media/bannerslides/lp_18_19_january_21_vn.jpg" data-mobiledesc="true" style="opacity: 1;"></a></div></div></div></div><div class="owl-controls"><div class="owl-buttons disabled"><div class="owl-prev">next</div><div class="owl-next">prev</div></div><div class="owl-dots disabled"><button role="button" class="owl-dot active validation-passed"><span></span></button></div></div></div>
<div><script type="text/javascript">
	jQuery(document).ready(function() {if(jQuery("#glamira-gift").length){var $owlThis = jQuery("#glamira-gift");if($owlThis.hasClass("ajaxloadfirst")){return;}var attrClass = $owlThis.attr('class') || false;if (typeof attrClass !== typeof undefined && attrClass !== false) {
                            $owlThis.addClass("ajaxloadfirst");
                        }else{
                            $owlThis.attr("class","ajaxloadfirst");
                        }$owlThis.owlCarousel({onLoadedLazy: function(e){
                        var $element = e.element;
                        if($element.length > 0){
                            jQuery($element).each(function(event) {
                                var attr = jQuery(this).attr('usemap') || false;
                                if (typeof attr !== typeof undefined && attr !== false) {
                                    jQuery(this).customImageMaps();
                                }
                            });
                        }
                    },onInitialized:function (event) {
                        var element = event.target;
                        jQuery(element).find('.owl-buttons, .owl-dots').wrapAll("<div class='owl-controls'></div>");
                    },nav: true,
                items: 1,
                animateOut: "fadeOut",
                navContainerClass: "owl-buttons",
                navElement:"div",
                navText:["next","prev"],
                navSpeed: 300,
                dotsSpeed: 300,
                lazyLoad: true,
                autoplay: false,
                mouseDrag: false,});jQuery.ajax({url:"https://www.glamira.vn/banners/slideshow/jsonData/identifier/glamira-gift",dataType: 'json',success: function(data) {
                    if(jQuery.isArray(data) && !data.length) {
                        jQuery("#glamira-gift").remove();
                        return;
                    }
                    var content = '';
                    var $owlThisLength = data.owl.length;
                    for (var i = 0;i < $owlThisLength; i++) {   
                        content = data.owl[i].item;
                        $owlThis.trigger('add.owl.carousel', [jQuery(content), i]);
                    }
                    if($owlThis.closest('.header_campaign').length){
                        var header_campaign = $owlThis.closest('.header_campaign');
                        if(header_campaign.find('.slide-content img').length){
                            header_campaign.find('.icon-wrapper').addClass('show');
                        }else{
                            header_campaign.find('.icon-wrapper').addClass('hide');
                        }
                    }
                    $owlThis.find('.slide-content img').each(function(event) {
                        var $t = jQuery(this);
                        var trust_url = $t.data('src');

                        var attr = jQuery(this).attr('usemap') || false;

                        if (trust_url && trust_url != 'undefined' && jQuery(window).width() <= 650 && ($t.attr('mobiledesc') == 'true'|| $t.attr('data-mobiledesc') == 'true')) {

                            var $attrDataSrc =  $t.attr('data-src') || false;
                            if (typeof $attrDataSrc !== typeof undefined && $attrDataSrc !== false) {
                                $t.attr('data-src', trust_url.replace(/.([^.]*)$/, '_mobile.' + '$1'));
                            }

                            if (typeof attr !== typeof undefined && attr !== false) {
                                var map = $t.attr('usemap').replace('#', ''),
                                c = 'coords',
                                cMobi = 'coordsmobi';
                                if($t.parent().find('map[name="' + map + '"]').find('area').length){
                                    $t.parent().find('map[name="' + map + '"]').find('area').each(function() {
                                        var $this = jQuery(this);
                                        if ($this.data(cMobi)){
                                            $this.attr(c, $this.data(cMobi));
                                        }
                                    });
                                }
                            }
                        }

                    });

                    var $owlThisData = $owlThis.data();
                    var $owlThisOptions = $owlThisData['owl.carousel'].options;
                    
                    if (typeof data['options'] !== 'undefined') {
                        if(typeof data['options']['autoplay'] !== 'undefined'){
                            $owlThisOptions.autoplay = true;
                        }
                    }
                    if($owlThisLength > 1){
                        $owlThisOptions.loop = true;
                    }
                    if($owlThisLength <= 1){
                        $owlThisOptions.nav = false;
                    }
                    $owlThis.trigger('initialized.owl.carousel')
                        .trigger('refresh.owl.carousel');
                    if(jQuery('.catalog-product-view').length && jQuery("#glamira-gift").closest('.product-view').length){
                        jQuery('.catalog-product-view').find('#product_production_capacity a').each(function(){
                            jQuery(this).attr('target',"_blank");
                        });
                        setPositionBottomProductView();
                    }

                }});}});</script></div>
<div class="owl-carousel owl-theme ajaxloadfirst owl-loaded" id="glamira-team"><div class="owl-stage-outer"><div class="owl-stage" style="width: 100px; transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px); transition: all 0s ease 0s;"><div class="owl-item active" style="width: 100px;"><div class="slide-content"><a style="background:#f6f6f6" title="New Terms 7-8 February"><img alt="New Terms 7-8 February" class="owl-lazy" src="https://res.cloudinary.com/glamira/image/upload/c_limit,c_fill,dpr_1.0,f_auto,fl_lossy,q_auto/media/bannerslides/terms_7_10_feb_update_vn.jpg" data-src="https://res.cloudinary.com/glamira/image/upload/c_limit,c_fill,dpr_1.0,f_auto,fl_lossy,q_auto/media/bannerslides/terms_7_10_feb_update_vn.jpg" data-mobiledesc="true" style="opacity: 1;"></a></div></div></div></div><div class="owl-controls"><div class="owl-buttons disabled"><div class="owl-prev">next</div><div class="owl-next">prev</div></div><div class="owl-dots disabled"><button role="button" class="owl-dot active validation-passed"><span></span></button></div></div></div>

                        setPositionBottomProductView();

<script type="text/javascript">
    document.observe("dom:loaded", function() {
        if($('apply_rule_discount') && Product.Options)
        {
            $('apply_rule_discount').observe('change', function (ele) {
                if (typeof(optionsPrice) != 'undefined' && optionsPrice && optionsPrice.changeApplyRuleDiscount) {
                    optionsPrice.changeApplyRuleDiscount();
                    $$('.apply_discount_wrapper span.message').each(function (ele){
                        ele.toggle();
                    });
                    setPositionBottomProductView();
                }
            });
            if (typeof(optionsPrice) != 'undefined' && optionsPrice && optionsPrice.reload)
            {
                optionsPrice.reload();
            }
        }

        if((jQuery('.apply_discount_row .icon-arrow').length > 0) && (jQuery('.view_detail_wrapper').length > 0)){

        	jQuery('.apply_discount_row .icon-arrow').on( "click", function(event) {
        		event.preventDefault();
        		jQuery( this ).toggleClass( "active" );
			  	jQuery('.view_detail_wrapper').toggle();
			});
        }

        if(jQuery('#apply_discount_wrapper .view_detail').length > 0){
        	jQuery('#apply_discount_wrapper .view_detail').click(function(){
				jQuery('#popup_coupon_discount_10_percent').modal('show');
			});
        }

        if($('popup_coupon_discount_10_percent')){
        	$('popup_coupon_discount_10_percent').down('.close_icon').observe('click',function(){
        		jQuery('#popup_coupon_discount_10_percent').modal('hide');
        	});
        }
    });
</script>                                            </div>

		<div id="captchahere1"><div style="width: 304px; height: 78px;"><div><iframe src="https://www.google.com/recaptcha/api2/anchor?ar=1&amp;k=6LfjIBoTAAAAAHKfkXDTMLaAlKKEzCFDuaUUbcQ1&amp;co=aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuZ2xhbWlyYS52bjo0NDM.&amp;hl=en&amp;v=r8jtf1oixV0IGff4hgB4EzDF&amp;size=normal&amp;cb=c0tspdtfjgxv" width="304" height="78" role="presentation" name="a-ucurs189qvat" frameborder="0" scrolling="no" sandbox="allow-forms allow-popups allow-same-origin allow-scripts allow-top-navigation allow-modals allow-popups-to-escape-sandbox"></iframe></div><textarea id="g-recaptcha-response" name="g-recaptcha-response" class="g-recaptcha-response" style="width: 250px; height: 40px; border: 1px solid rgb(193, 193, 193); margin: 10px 25px; padding: 0px; resize: none; display: none;"></textarea></div></div>
		<div class="buttons-set form-buttons">
			<p class="back-link">
				<span id="max_recipient_message" style="display:none;">
											Bạn chỉ có thể gửi 5 email người nhận.									</span>&nbsp;
			</p>
			<button type="submit" class="button send-email" onclick="ValidateForm();" id="button_send_email"><span><span>Gửi email</span></span></button>

		<p class="required">* Trường bắt buộc </p>
	</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
//<![CDATA[
    i=0;
    var recipCount  = 1;
    var maxRecip    = 5;
    function remove_recipient(i){
        $('recipients_name'+i).up(2).remove();
        recipCount--;
        if(recipCount<maxRecip && maxRecip != 0) {
            $('add_recipient_button').show();
            $('max_recipient_message').hide();
        }
		if($('MB_window') && $('form_mail_friend'))
		{
			if($('form_mail_friend').getDimensions().height < $('MB_window').getDimensions().height)
				$('MB_window').setStyle({overflow: 'visible'});
		}
        return false;
    }

    function add_recipient(){
        ul = $('recipients_options');
        var li_mail = Element.extend(document.createElement("li"));
        li_mail.addClassName('add-row');
        li_mail.addClassName('fields');
        li_mail.innerHTML = '<p class="btn-remove"><a href="delete_email" onclick="remove_recipient('+i+'); return false" class="btn-remove"><img src="' + "https://res.cloudinary.com/glamira/image/upload/c_limit,dpr_1.0,f_auto,fl_lossy,q_auto/skin/frontend/glamira2014/default/images/btn_remove.gif" + '" alt="' + "Xóa bỏ" + '" /><\/a><\/p>'
        li_mail.innerHTML += '<div class="field"><label for="recipients_name'+i+'" class="required">' + "Tên của bạn" + '<em>*<\/em><\/label><div class="input-box"><input name="recipients[name][]" type="text" class="input-text required-entry" id="recipients_name'+i+'" /><\/div><\/div>';
        li_mail.innerHTML += '<div class="field right"><label for="recipients_email'+i+'" class="required">' + "Địa chỉ email" + '<em>*<\/em><\/label><div class="input-box"><input name="recipients[email][]" value="" title="' + "Địa chỉ email" + '" id="recipients_email'+i+'" type="text" class="input-text required-entry validate-email" /><\/div><\/div>';
        i++;
        recipCount++;
        if(recipCount>=maxRecip && maxRecip != 0) {
            $('add_recipient_button').hide();
            $('max_recipient_message').show();
        }
		if($('MB_window') && $('form_mail_friend'))
		{ 
			$('MB_window').setStyle({overflowX: 'hidden'});
		}
        ul.appendChild(li_mail);
    }
//]]>
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
//<![CDATA[
	function ValidateForm()
	{
		var productSendtofriendForm = new VarienForm('product_sendtofriend_form');
			productSendtofriendForm.submit = function() {
			if(this.validator.validate()) {
				this.form.submit();
			}
		}.bind(productSendtofriendForm);
	}
    
//]]>
</script>
